title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 124-2.1 - Purpose and Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 124-2.1 - Purpose and Applicability

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to establish a framework for
the development and implementation of regionalization plans by component school
districts in collaboration with district superintendents. The goal of
regionalization plans is to increase opportunities for students, build upon the
existing strengths and capacity in communities across New York, address
enrollment challenges, and manage fiscal constraints by fostering equitable
educational environments through regional collaboration. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
